section: The squatters cannot see why they shouldn’t use your property while you’re away at sea. A vigorous two-fisted arguement soon sets them straight, but you get a bloody nose and a black eye in the process of evicting them. You throw them in the mud at the side of the river before striding back to your shack. Lose 1-6 Stamina and (if you can survive that) turn to 74.
